tuv.seg: Your health after birth
Do Shláinte tar éis na Breithe
Pregnancy and childbirth put a great strain on your body and it will take time to recover, particularly if you have had a difficult labour or a Caesarean section
Cuireann toircheas agus breith linbh stró mór ar do chorp agus tógfaidh sé riar ama teacht chugat féin arís, go háirithe má bhí luí seoil chrua agat nó gearradh Caesarach
You may have been ill after having your baby, or you may suffer from a common range of minor ailments and infections that affect new mothers
B'fhéidir go raibh tú tinn tar éis duit do leanbh a shaolú, nó b'fhéidir go mbeifeá ag fulaingt ó raon coitianta mionbhreoiteachtaí agus mionionfhabhtuithe a chuireann isteach ar mháithre
Your hospital or public health nurse will be able to supply you with details of local postnatal exercise classes
Beidh ar chumas an ospidéal nó do altra sláinte poiblí mionsonraí a chur ar fáil duit maidir le ranganna aclaíochta iarbhreithe
If you have had a normal delivery, you will then have a check-up after 2 weeks and then after 6 weeks
Má bhí gnáthluí seoil agat, ansin cuirfear scrúdú ort tar éis 2 sheachtain agus arís tar éis 6 seachtain
This will be carried out either by your GP or by the hospital if you had your baby in hospital
Déanfaidh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh nó an ospidéal ina raibh an páiste agat é sin
Your GP or hospital doctor will discuss any health problems with you and may take a cervical smear
Pléifidh do dhochtúir teaghlaigh/dhochtúir ospidéil aon fhadhbanna sláinte leis agus b'fhéidir go dtógfadh siad smearadh ceirbheacsach
For some women, breastfeeding is established easily, but others find it takes longer to get comfortable
Do roinnt ban, tarlaíonn beathú cíchego héasca, ach tógann se níos faide ar dhaoine eile a bheith compordach
Some find that the demands of a young baby and a new lifestyle make them feel low and, sometimes depressed
Mothaíonn roinnt go n-íslíonn riachtanais naíonáin óga agus bealach nua saoil a meanmna, agus ó am go chéile, bíonn dúlagar orthu
This is quite normal after having a baby and help is available
Is gnáthrud é sin tar éis leanbh a shaolú agus tá cabhair ar fáil
